title: VAPU: System for Autonomous Legacy Code Modernization
data:
V Ala-Salmi, Z Rasheed, AM Sami, M Waseem- arXiv preprint arXiv, 2025
In this study, we present a solution for the modernization of legacy applications, an 
area of code generation where LLM-based multi-agent systems are proving essential 
for complex multi-phased tasks. Legacy applications often contain deprecated 
components that create compatibility, security, and reliability risks, but high resource 
costs make companies hesitate to update. We take a step forward to integrate an 
LLM-based multi-agent system as part of a legacy web application update to provide
